name: AVIF Studio
description: Extension for image editing, annotation. Save image as AVIF/PNG/JPEG/WEBP/PDF . Support all major image formats
author: Shareej V K

content_security_policy.extension_pages: style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data: https: file:; connect-src 'self' data:; default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'wasm-unsafe-eval';
